description:
Our beautiful, recently renovated 3 bedrooms apartment in Brooklyn is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and families with kids. 

We are on the top floor of a 2 floor building, which means that we get lots of light from windows on all sides of the apartment, as well as from skylights in the living & bathroom. The master bedroom has a queen bed, the second bedroom has a full, and the third has an air mattress. There is also a couch in the living room that is very comfortable to sleep on.

You will have full access to the whole apartment - 3 bedrooms, kitchen, living room and bathroom.

We are very close to the Nostrand Ave Long Island Rail Road stop, as well as the A, C & G subway lines.
name: Beautiful, Open 3 Bedroom Apartment in Brooklyn
review: The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
